text: You go to the design manager <@UGK31R5HS> in that portal it creates

Has anyone dealt with porting pages (not just templates) from one portal to another, I was thinking i could use the api, but not sure if anyone else has other solutions / ideas?
has anybody encountered issues with javascript not running on live (staged) page but working properly in the template preview?  (no extra scripts added at the page level)

The email should have had some more details in it. You probably don’t have to worry about it though. Typically it only happens when a bad client doesn’t handle encoding well. if you have a domain, I can check if there’s been any instances during the last week.
What’s the domain? They may be because of external resources.

<trigger alert> Question about date/time formats</Trigger?

I have a csv file which I need has date time as a string ’Sun, 17 Mar 2013 19:33:00 +0000

What’s the best way to convert to Epoch time for HubSpot JSON API sync?
